message: For Logicon, an upcoming science and critical thinking day conference I am helping to organize, we're planning to hold a series of lightning talks during part of the day...

One of the things our group focuses on is myths and misconceptions. I thought some sort of technology slanted "myth/misconception" talk could be interesting.  Alternatively, one on more directed at clearing up some information on internet privacy or security
The lightning talk section is currently not featured on our website, but more information on that front is coming soon. http://www.logicon.ca/
Are you looking for speakers, ideas, both?
Speakers. Our schedule is pretty full overall, but we still have slots open on the lightning talk front.
